name: Narrow Escape3D
description:
Try this nice game Narrow Escape! The cops are on your tail! Show off your driving skills by avoiding and outsmarting them! Choose the car you like, drive as fast as you can to lose the cops!

Easy to play! Control your car by tapping & make the enemies crash into each other, to build your combo and increase your cash! Get more cash to upgrade skills & unlock more crazy cars!

But make sure you don't get too damaged, or you'll end up wasted!

- Play for completely free!
- Simple & satisfying gameplay
- Multiple getaway cars
- Advanced A.I. cop cars
- Easy to play but hard to master
- Amazing music and graphics
